bibl.title: Ostraka and Other Inscribed Material from Bīr Shawīsh, Small Oasis
bibl.seg: Marek Dospěl, Ostraka and Other Inscribed Material from Bīr Shawīsh, Small Oasis. Excavation Seasons 2005 and 2007 = American Studies in Papyrology. 54.
Ann Arbor, American Society of Papyrologists, 2020, xviii-212 pp. ISBN 978-09799758-7-5. $85.
C.R. par Arthur Verhoogt, BASP 59 (2022) pp. 406-408.
bibl.note: O. Bir Shawish 1-50; - I. Bir Shawish 1-36. - Revised version of a PhD dissertation, Charles Univ., Prague, 2015. - Preface and Acknowledgments. - 1. Introduction. - 2. Bīr Shawīsh in the el-Ḥāyz Oasis. - 3. Inscribed Material from Bīr Shawīsh. - 4. Selected Aspects of the Documentation. - 5. Late Antique Bīr Shawīsh from a Papyrological Perspective: A Conclusion. - Bibliography. Indices.
